docs.lead_paragraph: The images are awfully reminiscent: Think of Yasir Arafat in a ski cap and baby-blue pajamas, or a sickly Fidel Castro, outfitted in an Adidas track suit.

headline.main: A Dictator's Health, and the Pictures To Prove It

docs.abstract: When the boss drops out of sight for a while and the rumors of a covered-up incapacity start to fly, authoritarian regimes from Cuba to North Korea tend to reach for a camera to rebut them.
docs.snippet: When the boss drops out of sight for a while and the rumors of a covered-up incapacity start to fly, authoritarian regimes from Cuba to North Korea tend to reach for a camera to rebut them.

docs.lead_paragraph: Pregnant women who gain more than 40 pounds are about twice as likely to give birth to a heavy baby as those who gain less, new research suggests.

headline.seo: Big Weight Gain in Pregnancy Can Lead to a Heavy Baby
headline.main: Risks: Extra Pregnancy Weight Tied to Big Baby

docs.snippet: Pregnant women who gain more than 40 pounds are about twice as likely to give birth to a heavy baby as those who gain less, new research suggests.
